text: Bɨ anɨb ak takaw ogɨnap sek agɨl agak, Pen ensel ne Tayatayla binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak, takaw agɨnɨgebin ak ensel ak nop kɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. God Ñɨne, wɨdɨn mab mɨŋɨlaŋ tek mɨdɨl, tob kɨd ne ak, tap kɨles blas apal ak dagɨlel yɨnɨl kɨlɨd dup tek gak ak, takaw nɨm ak agyokeb agak.
